results.title: Comparison of Efficacy and Safety of Azilsartan and Amlodipine Combination Versus Telmisartan and Amlodipine Combination in Hypertensive Patients: A Non-inferiority Trial
results.text_hl: Safety analysis of our study showed that @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ was the most frequently reported adverse effect in the @CHEMICAL_azilsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C521273 @@@azilsartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group (12%).

results.title: Efficacy and Safety of Yangxue Qingnao Pills Combined with Amlodipine in Treatment of Hypertensive Patients with Blood Deficiency and Gan-Yang Hyperactivity: A Multicenter, Randomized Controlled Trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Combination therapy of YXQNP with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ significantly improved symptoms such as @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, reduced blood pressure variability, and showed a trend toward lowering urinary microalbumin in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang F, Gao HQ, Lyu Z, Wang XM, Han H, Wang YX, Lu F, Dong B, Pu J, Liu F, Zu XG, Liu HB, Yang L, Zhang SY, Yan YM, Wang XL, Chen JH, Liu M, Yang YM, Li XY. Efficacy and Safety of Yangxue Qingnao Pills Combined with Amlodipine in Treatment of Hypertensive Patients with Blood Deficiency and Gan-Yang Hyperactivity: A Multicenter, Randomized Controlled Trial. results.title: Guillain-Barre Syndrome Complicated by Posterior Reversible Encephalopathy Syndrome and Reversible Cerebral Vasoconstriction Syndrome
results.journal: Eur J Case Rep Intern Med
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@Hypertension@@@ was controlled with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (5 mg). Her @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headaches@@@ and blood pressure stabilised in 9 days, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was discontinued.

results.title: Posterior reversible encephalopathy syndrome in a patient with late postpartum eclampsia
results.text_hl: On day 2, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ became conscious, @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ and vision improved.

results.title: Pharmacokinetic and Safety Profiles of a Fixed-Dose Combination of Amlodipine, Valsartan, and Atorvastatin: A 3-Period Replicate Crossover Study
results.text_hl: According to previous studies, @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ was a common AE following administration of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ combination,27 and increased @GENE_CMPK1 @GENE_51727 @@@CK@@@ was one of the well-recognized AEs of atorvastatin.28 There was no significant difference in terms of safety between the 2 interventions.

citations.NLM: Kim S, Ko JW, Kim JR. Pharmacokinetic and Safety Profiles of a Fixed-Dose Combination of Amlodipine, Valsartan, and Atorvastatin: A 3-Period Replicate Crossover Study Clin Pharmacol Drug Dev. 2020 Apr;9(3):386-394. PMID: 31373174

results.title: Difficulties in the diagnostics of chronic hyponatremia based on the case study of a 66-year old female patient during antihypertensive therapy.
results.text_hl: For about two years the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ had suffered from the following symptoms: severe @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headaches@@@, @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, episodic mental @DISEASE_Confusion @DISEASE_MESH:D003221 @@@confusions@@@, stomachaches, and @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@.

citations.NLM: Winiarska K, Taborek M, Czerwieńska B, Więcek A, Adamczak M. Difficulties in the diagnostics of chronic hyponatremia based on the case study of a 66-year old female patient during antihypertensive therapy. Pol Merkur Lekarski. 2021 Aug 16;49(292):303-305. PMID: 34464373

results.title: [Comorbidity of arterial hyperten-sion and tension-type headache].
results.text_hl: Triplixam is a fixed triple combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@/@CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@/@CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@, and its individual components have low and medium risk for development of @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@.

citations.NLM: Petrova MM, Moskaleva PV, Shnayder NA, Nasyrova RF. [Comorbidity of arterial hyperten-sion and tension-type headache]. Kardiologiia. 2020 Nov 12;60(10):132-140. PMID: 33228516

results.title: Amlodipine: The double edged sword.
results.text_hl: This is mainly due to its long half-life making it easy to use as a single daily dose. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is associated with common side effects like @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ and @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@.

citations.NLM: Rabah F, El-Naggari M, Al-Nabhani D. Amlodipine: The double edged sword. J Paediatr Child Health. 2017 Jun;53(6):540-542. PMID: 28387969
